translations: 能量中心；轮穴（身体上能量的进出口）

sentences.sentence: The 7 chakras are the centers of energy along the midline of your body.
sentences.translation: 这七个轮穴是你身体中线的能量中心。

sentences.sentence: With enough control over the chakras, the energy for these higher levels can be produced.
sentences.translation: 对脉轮具有足够的控制，就可以生成前往这些更高层次所需的能量。

sentences.sentence: The health of the 7 chakras will influence the colors of the aura. (Read the Rainbow Mandala).
sentences.translation: “七轮”(梵文，人体的七个能量中心)的健康会影响到人的气场的颜色。
